docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2.--The increasing need of European nations preparing for war for manufactured products and lubricating oil from the United States stood out as the featuring of the report of the Department of Commerce on exports to Europe for July...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2.--The increasing need of European nations preparing for war for manufactured products and lubricating oil from the United States stood out as the featuring of the report of the Department of Commerce on exports to Europe for July and for the first seven months of 1939, which was made public today.

headline.main: OUTLOOK FOR WAR AIDS FOREIGN TRADE; Sharp Increases in Exports of Manufactured Goods and Oil Made in July and 7 Months JULY TOTAL TO EUROPE UP $90,021,000 Compares With $87,787,000 Year Before-- United Kingdom Leads Exports to Europe Rise Increase to Poland 5% Gain to South America Movements by Countries

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMESTimes Wide World, 1938

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 2.--Sir George Thomas, B.M. Wood and P.S. Miiner-Barry, members of England's team, one of the sixteen in the finals of the tournament of the International Chess Federation, have withdrawn from the competition and sailed for their...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 2.--Sir George Thomas, B.M. Wood and P.S. Miiner-Barry, members of England's team, one of the sixteen in the finals of the tournament of the International Chess Federation, have withdrawn from the competition and sailed for their native country.

headline.main: British Quit Buenos Aires Chess Because of War's Threat at Home; Group Sails From Argentina, Leaving Only 15 Teams in International Contests-- Capablanca Victor for Cubans Poland's Players Advance Close Call for Cuba Rivals to Meet Again Canadians Turned Back Captured Four in Row

docs.snippet: THE first International Congress of the American Musicological Society will be held Sept. 11-16 at the Beethoven  Association. Distinguished European and South American music scholars, as well as musicologists ...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE first International Congress of the American Musicological Society will be held Sept. 11-16 at the Beethoven Association. Distinguished European and South American music scholars, as well as musicologists ...

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Sept. 3.--President Pedro Aguirre, after conferring with the Ministers of Finance, Interior and National Defense, today dictated an order refusing to permit the sale or lease of any Chilean vessel whatsoever now employed in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Sept. 3.--President Pedro Aguirre, after conferring with the Ministers of Finance, Interior and National Defense, today dictated an order refusing to permit the sale or lease of any Chilean vessel whatsoever now employed in the merchant trade to foreign interests without the government's consent.

headline.main: CHILE BARS SHIP SALE TO FOREIGN NATIONS; Also Curbs Export of All Goods Convertible to War Uses
